Dividends Paid: payment for distribution to limited partner
Net Cash from Financing Activities: net cash provided by used in financing activities
Proceeds from Debt: proceeds from issuance of senior long term debt
proceeds from repayments of commercial paper and lines of credit
proceeds from repayments of lines of credit
Repayment of Debt: repayments of long term lines of credit

Capital Expenditures: additions to gas gathering processing and transmission facilities
payments to acquire oil and gas properties leasehold and property
payments to acquire oil and gas properties proved
payments to explore and develop oil and gas properties
Net Cash from Investing Activities: net cash provided by used in investing activities
Other Investing Activities: proceeds from sale of oil and gas property and equipment
results of operations dry hole costs
Sales and Maturities of Investments: proceeds from sale of equity method investments

Net Change in Cash: cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents period increase decrease including exchange rate effect

Changes in Operating Assets and Liabilit: increase decrease in prepaid deferred expense and other assets
increase decrease of deferred charges deferred credits and noncurrent liabilities
Net Cash from Operating Activities: net cash provided by used in operating activities
Other Non-Cash Items: gain loss on sale of properties
gains losses on extinguishment of debt
